ai-mil7.3.2:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the three factors should be called by an abode?”
ai-mil7.3.2:1.2_0: “Judging in the water, rising above the water, below the water,
ai-mil7.3.2:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives in balance among good families, having gained material possessions and honor, respect, reverence, and veneration given to all these:
ai-mil7.3.2:1.4_0: This is the first place, great king, this is the first place.
ai-mil7.3.2:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, from the stomach archery story of water.
ai-mil7.3.2:2.2_0: In the same way, having performed a great sacrifice, he should return to the realm of luminous world.
ai-mil7.3.2:2.3_0: this is the second great king.
ai-mil7.3.2:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, Padumuttara, being heedful and serpent, arranged lamp,
ai-mil7.3.2:3.2_0: In the same way, there are those who live diligently, keen, and resolute. They’re diligent in, keen, and resolute. They should practice meditation to get rid of the defilements.
ai-mil7.3.2:3.3_0: This is the third coals of the Ganges.
